Title: Large Express Car Wash
Industry: Brick & Mortar,Automotive & Boat,Other Automotive & Boat,Car Washes,
Description:
A large express car wash, built in 2020, featuring a 190 ft tunnel, top of the line control and vacuum system, and an extra large building for high end detailing.

Top Highlights:
• Built in 2020
• Over 2 acres site
• 190 ft tunnel
• High-end detailing facility

Additional Information:
• Absentee run
• Potential package deal with another express wash in OC
